snippet: As Democrats formally nominate President Obama, Mitt Romney is getting ready for what aides believe will be a decisive moment for his campaign.
abstract: Mitt Romney has turned his attention to preparing for the presidential debates, which he and his aides view as a decisive juncture in the campaign; preparation has included a series of mock debates at a secluded location in West Windsor, Vermont.
lead_paragraph: As Democrats formally nominate President Obama, Mitt Romney is getting ready for what aides believe will be a decisive moment for his campaign.

headline.main: Romney Focus Is on Preparing for the Debates
headline.print_headline: Romney Focus Is on Preparing For the Debates
